title: Online Electronic Verification of Vital Events (EVVE)
text_content:
Check the following list to determine if your state/jurisdiction participates in Online EVVE and if your birth year is within the available birth year range. If your state, jurisdiction or territory is not listed, or if your birth year is not within the birth year range, you will not be able to use the Online EVVE service. For more information about EVVE, view
Electronic Verification of Vital Records
.
Note: the Online EVVE service does not provide a paper birth certificate.
States, Jurisdictions and Territories Participating in EVVE
